name: very cool normals here
description:
this game has a cool normal map and also lightbulbs in the top left corner of the screen therefore you should play it

made during det grønne gamejam 2022

now download and play the game

(Version one is unbeatable btw)

DO NOT CLICK LEFT ARROW KEY IT IS CURSED

(if left arrow key clicked, press alt + f4 and restart gaem)

made by Mixelmaster (programming & unity) and Twinkle SunnySun (3D, normal map, & other graphics)
